docs.lead_paragraph: The Minister of Welfare of one of the Middle East nations visited the United States recently to study our health and welfare programs. He hoped to learn methods that would help improve the status of the people of his country.

headline.main: A Point Four for U. S. Indians Urged to Better Their Health; Nation Is Criticized for Its Failure to Use Tribal Councils to Spur Self-Aid

docs.abstract: Dr Rusk on US inadequate health and welfare programs; cites Indian Affairs Assn com charge that US fails to seek tribal councils aid
docs.snippet: The Minister of Welfare of one of the Middle East nations visited the United States recently to study our health and welfare programs. He hoped to learn methods that would help improve the status of the people of his country.
